FuncDef:
The te ipv6-router-id command sets a global TE IPv6 router ID.
The undo te ipv6-router-id command deletes a global TE IPv6 router ID.
By default, no global TE IPv6 router ID is set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To set a global TE IPv6 router ID, run the te ipv6-router-id command. The setting does not depend on global MPLS.
The TE IPv6 Router ID must be configured on the tunnel ingress node and can be any value. However, it must be globally unique.
Precautions
If an SRv6 tunnel exists, the global TE IPv6 router ID cannot be modified or deleted.
